prog: (Maxima)a(n):=sum(sum((((-1)^(k-m)+1)*(sum(binomial(j-1,m-1)*j!*2^(k-j-1) *stirling2(k,j)*(-1)^((m+k)/2+j),j,m,k))*((-1)^(n-k)+1)*sum((2*i-k)^n *binomial(k,i)*(-1)^((n+k)/2-i),i,0,k/2))/(2^k*k!),k,m,n)/m!,m,1,n);[From _Vladimir Kruchinin_, May 05 2011](PARI)x='x+O('x^66); /* that many terms */egf=exp(tan(sin(x))); /* = 1 + x + 1/2*x^2 + 1/3*x^3 + 5/24*x^4 + ... */Vec(serlaplace(egf)) /* show terms */ /* _Joerg Arndt_, May 05 2011 */
